Deako (YC-W16) | Senior Software Dev | Seattle, WA | Onsite, Full-time | deako.com

Fast growing home automation company in Seattle. Our product is a mesh connected smart light switch that lets users control any light from any switch in the home. Our hot swappable design lets users and builders upgrade dumb switches to smart in seconds.

Our full stack engineers use Python, Flask, AWS, RDS, React and other tech. If you like to geek out on IoT, Python, and home automation then come join us.

Apply here: https://www.deako.com/careers
